```{r}
heights = c(157, 161, 123, 144, 156, 177)
mean(heights)
```
```{r}
# The population variance can be calculated by multiplying the sample variance by (n-1)/n as follows.
n <- length(heights)
var(heights)*(n-1)/n
```
